name: my-api-test-server
description: Postman API Automation with Professional HTML Reporting

scripts.test:all: newman run tests/postman_collection.json -e tests/postman_environment.json -d tests/data/order_create_invalid_data.json -r htmlextra --suppress-exit-code --reporter-htmlextra-export ./reports/create.html && newman run tests/postman_collection.json -e tests/postman_environment.json -d tests/data/order_update_invalid_data.json -r htmlextra --suppress-exit-code --reporter-htmlextra-export ./reports/update.html && newman run tests/postman_collection.json -e tests/postman_environment.json -d tests/data/signup_invalid_data.json -r htmlextra --suppress-exit-code --reporter-htmlextra-export ./reports/signup.html

author: Christine Kim
